references.paper_title: A critical analysis of self-supervision, or what we can learn from a single image
references.reason: This paper provides a critical analysis of self-supervised learning, challenging the assumptions and highlighting the limitations of existing methods.

references.paper_title: Self-Supervised Learning from Images with a Joint-Embedding Predictive Architecture
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel self-supervised learning architecture, I-JEPA, that achieves strong performance without relying on extensive data augmentations.

references.paper_title: BEIT: BERT Pre-Training of Image Transformers
references.reason: This paper introduces BEIT, a self-supervised learning method based on BERT pre-training that achieves strong results on image classification tasks.

references.paper_title: A simple framework for contrastive learning of visual representations
references.reason: This paper introduces a simple framework for contrastive learning, which has become a cornerstone method in self-supervised learning.

references.paper_title: Emerging properties in self-supervised vision transformers
references.reason: This paper investigates the emerging properties of self-supervised vision transformers, advancing the understanding of these models and their effectiveness.
